name: Pig Pile (itch)
description:
This Is my entry to ludum dare 42.

Play as a pig farmer and use an axe and shotgun to slaughter the evil swines.

Use AD to move 
WS to climb up and down ladders 
SPACE to jump 
E to switch weapons 
P to toggle block placing mode 
ENTER to attack, place a meat block or press a button
